Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As a current NCS participant, you are eligible to apply for HeadStart - an exclusive programme run by The Challenge. We have developed this in partnership with the Mayor of London to give you the skills and experience to get ahead.
As you live in a designated Heathrow Community Fund area, current applications are only open to people in your local area, so don't miss out!
The HeadStart programme is made up of three simple steps:
Volunteer for at least 16 hours before the end of January. We can help you find your own volunteering placement or you can choose from some great opportunities on the HeadStart website.
Engage in exclusive skills workshops, developed with leading employers to give you the right skills and aptitude to get ahead, including expert communications coaching and interview preparation sessions.
Get a guaranteed interview for a part-time/seasonal job with New Look, Starbucks or Lloyds Banking Group, or an exclusive paid internship with the Mayor of London's office or Zendesk.
Applications for HeadStart open on 13th November!
You will receive an email with your unique application ID.The deadline for applications is midnight Sunday 22nd November 2015.
Here is Emmanuella - a recent HeadStart graduate - to tell you about her HeadStart experience.
HeadStart will help you:
Gain skills and experience
Be more employable
Stand out on your UCAS form
Meet new people and get back together with friends from NCS 2015!
If you have any difficulties or need to ask us a question, please email us at
